price: 112. Alle wuxuu ka yeelay tusaale: magaalo nabad aheyd xasilloon; oo uu uga yimaado risiqeedu haqab la’aan meel walba, ha yeeshee ku gaalowday Nicmooyinkii Alle. Sidaas darteed Alle ka yeelay inay dhadhamiso gaajo daran iyo cabsi waxay samaynayeen darteed27.
arabic: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا قَرۡيَةٗ كَانَتۡ ءَامِنَةٗ مُّطۡمَئِنَّةٗ يَأۡتِيهَا رِزۡقُهَا رَغَدٗا مِّن كُلِّ مَكَانٖ فَكَفَرَتۡ بِأَنۡعُمِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَذَٰقَهَا ٱللَّهُ لِبَاسَ ٱلۡجُوعِ وَٱلۡخَوۡفِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ
footnotes: 27. Gaajo iyo cabsi u hareereyso sida dharku ugu hareersan yahay jirka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba al-lahu mathalan qaryatan kānat āminatan muṭ'ma-innatan yatīhā riz'quhā raghadan min kulli makānin fakafarat bi-anʿumi al-lahi fa-adhāqahā al-lahu libāsa al-jūʿi wal-khawfi bimā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
